content.json: >**NOTE:** This workbook uses a parser based on a Kusto Function to normalize fields. [Follow these steps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/master/Parsers/CiscoUmbrella/Cisco_Umbrella) to create the Kusto function alias **Cisco_Umbrella**.

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| summarize Count=count() by EventType
| render barchart
content.title: Events Count by EventType
Events over time
Blocks over time
Network Breakdown Statistic

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| summarize count() by DvcAction
content.title: DNS - Events count by Action

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| summarize Count=count() by DnsQueryTypeName | sort by Count
content.title: DNS - Events count by QueryType

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where isnotempty(ThreatCategory)
| extend Threat_Category=parsejson(tostring(ThreatCategory))
| mv-expand Threat_Category
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(Threat_Category)
| sort by Count 
| join kind = inner (
Cisco_Umbrella
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| where isnotempty(ThreatCategory)
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| extend Threat_Category=parsejson(tostring(ThreatCategory))
| mv-expand Threat_Category
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by tostring(Threat_Category))
 on Threat_Category
 | project-away Threat_Category1, TimeGenerated
 | project Threat_Category, Count, Trend
 | order by Count
| take 10
content.title: DNS - Events by Threat Category

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| where isnotempty(UrlCategory)
| extend Url_Category=parsejson(tostring(UrlCategory))
| mv-expand Url_Category
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(Url_Category)
| sort by Count
| join kind = inner (
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| where isnotempty(UrlCategory)
| extend Url_Category=parsejson(tostring(UrlCategory))
| mv-expand Url_Category
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by tostring(Url_Category))
 on Url_Category
 | project-away Url_Category1, TimeGenerated
 | project Url_Category, Count, Trend
 | order by Count
| take 10
content.title: DNS - Events by Url Category

content.query:
let list_IP = Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| where DvcAction == "Blocked"
|summarize Count=count() by SrcIpAddr | top 10 by Count
| summarize makelist(SrcIpAddr);
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| where DvcAction == "Blocked"
|summarize Count=count() by SrcIpAddr 
| join kind = inner (
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| where DvcAction == "Blocked"
| where SrcIpAddr in (list_IP)
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SrcIpAddr)
 on SrcIpAddr
 |  project-away SrcIpAddr1, TimeGenerated
 | project SrcIpAddr, Count, Trend
 | order by Count
| take 10
content.title: DNS - Top 10 SrcIp with Blocked Action

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where EventType == "dnslogs"
| where DvcAction == "Blocked"
| summarize Count=count() by DnsQueryName, UrlCategory 
| top 10 by Count
content.title: DNS - Top 10 Blocked Url

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "proxylogs"
| summarize count() by DvcAction
content.title: Proxy - Events count by Action
Proxy - Traffic timechart, GB

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "proxylogs"
| where isnotempty(UrlCategory)
| extend Url_Category=parsejson(tostring(UrlCategory))
| mv-expand Url_Category
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(Url_Category)
| sort by Count
| join kind = inner (
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "proxylogs"
| where isnotempty(UrlCategory)
| extend Url_Category=parsejson(tostring(UrlCategory))
| mv-expand Url_Category
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by tostring(Url_Category))
 on Url_Category
 | project-away Url_Category1, TimeGenerated
 | project Url_Category, Count, Trend
 | order by Count
| take 10
content.title: Proxy - Events by Url Category

content.query:
let list_IP = Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "proxylogs"
| where DvcAction == "BLOCKED"
|summarize Count=count() by SrcIpAddr | top 10 by Count
| summarize makelist(SrcIpAddr);
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "proxylogs"
| where DvcAction == "BLOCKED"
|summarize Count=count() by SrcIpAddr 
| join kind = inner (
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "proxylogs"
| where DvcAction == "BLOCKED"
| where SrcIpAddr in (list_IP)
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SrcIpAddr)
 on SrcIpAddr
 |  project-away SrcIpAddr1, TimeGenerated
 | project SrcIpAddr, Count, Trend
 | order by Count
| take 10
content.title: Proxy - Top 10 Source IP with Blocked Action

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "proxylogs"
| where isnotempty(ThreatCategory)
| extend Threat_Category=parsejson(tostring(ThreatCategory))
| mv-expand Threat_Category
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(Threat_Category)
| sort by Count 
| join kind = inner (
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "proxylogs"
| where isnotempty(ThreatCategory)
| extend Threat_Category=parsejson(tostring(ThreatCategory))
| mv-expand Threat_Category
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by tostring(Threat_Category))
 on Threat_Category
 | project-away Threat_Category1, TimeGenerated
 | project Threat_Category, Count, Trend
 | order by Count
| take 10
content.title: Proxy - Events by Threat Category

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where EventType == "proxylogs"
| where DvcAction == "BLOCKED"
| summarize Count=count() by UrlOriginal, UrlCategory 
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Proxy - Top 10 Blocked Url

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "cloudfirewalllogs"
| summarize count() by DvcAction
content.title: Firewall - Events count by Action

content.query:
Cisco_Umbrella
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where EventType == "cloudfirewalllogs"
| make-series Packets = sum(toint(NetworkPackets)) on TimeGenerated  from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by NetworkDirection
content.title: Firewall - Traffic over time, Packets
Firewall - Block Events over time
